ygData.subject: EQ Report
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi. I am doing a report/speech on EQ in school, and I wondered if you guys could give me any advice on it. The class it s for is seventh grade Introduction to
ygData.messageBody:
Hi. I am doing a report/speech on EQ in school,
and I wondered if you guys could give me any advice
on it. The class it's for is seventh grade
Introduction to Public Speaking, and it is supposed to be an
informative speech. I need to create an outline, and put
ideas on notecards and give the speech in an
extemporaneous manner. I am also supposed to use visual aids. If
you have any good info, and/or ideas that will help
me out, they're greately appreciated. You can reply
to this message, I recieve the club messages by
email, or email me directly at safritz@... Thanks a
bunch.<br><br>Andalite_14
